DOC.brief_summary: This study design test efficacy energy drink . This double-blinded , crossover , randomize clinical trial , measure effect test drink compare placebo drink 200 participant age 18-70 year .
DOC.detailed_description: This study design test efficacy energy drink compare placebo via double-blind , crossover , randomize clinical trial . Energy level assess consumption test beverages 2 day separate week 200 participant age 18-70 year . The study crossover participant ( randomly ) receive one drink Test Day 1 drink Test Day 2 . After sign write informed consent , participant feed light lunch , pulse , weight height measure . A baseline battery computer-based test assess energy level conduct . These computer-based measure take ~40 minute complete include : ) long-term memory test b ) Profile Mood States ( POMS2 ) brief form ; c ) Rapid Visual Information Processing ( RVIP ) test , ) The N-Back Task ; ) Reaction time online test ; f ) Flanker Task . Participants ask fill baseline survey ( 30 min ) , question current health-related behavior , specifically question physical activity diet . Upon complete baseline battery ( survey administer test session 1 ) , participant randomly administer energy drink placebo consume observe . Subsequently , battery computer-based test assess energy level re-administered 30 minute , 2.5 hour 5 hour consumption test drink . The study intervention double-blinded : participant blind whether receive active placebo drink , study team member also aware assignment . When study end , full compensation give intervention fully complete ; intervention fully complete , partial compensation give .
DOC.criteria: Fluent read English High school graduate low education level Nonsmoker No diagnosed/treated cognitive/psychiatric condition selfreport No diagnosed/treated diabetes , hypoglycemia thyroid condition selfreport No current use prescription stimulant medication selfreport No allergy sensitivities food , ingredient chemical selfreport , contain test drink placebo No diagnose phenylketonuria
